title: "Data Manipulation"
author: "Matt Maslow"
format: html
---


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(httr)
```


```{r}
# webscraping for the Bull Riders data (2023 Touring Pro Division)
url <- "https://azcms.pbr.com/statistics/rider/?season=2023&tour=TPD-US"
rider_data <- url %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes("table") %>%
  html_table() %>%
  .[[1]]
rider_data %>% head()
```
